backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining comprehensive healthcare platform types (professionals, hospitals, vendors, NGOs, medical records, research projects) with role-based access control, blob storage mixins, and CRUD operations for stakeholder management and registration workflows.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four dropdown styling features that apply Royal Teal background and white text to all select/dropdown components via global CSS and Tailwind configuration updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities with details on routing, authentication, role-based dashboards, registration flows, document management, and responsive design patterns.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind layers defining OKLCH color system variables for light/dark themes, including Royal Teal accent colors and comprehensive base styling for body and border elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with viewport meta tag, favicon link, and root div mounting point for the SPA.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application router configuration using TanStack Router, defining all route paths (onboarding, dashboard, admin, documents, patient journey, legal pages, etc.) with Layout wrapper component.
frontend/src/components/Chatbot.tsx: AI chatbot component with expandable floating interface, message history, contextual responses about healthcare services/contact info/platform features, and Royal Teal accent styling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the application footer with brand logo, social media links, navigation columns (Quick Links, Services, Legal), and copyright information. Uses TanStack Router for internal links and displays the current year dynamically.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component that wraps the application with Navigation header, main content area (using Outlet for nested routes), and Footer. Provides consistent page structure across all routes.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with logo, desktop/mobile menus, and authentication controls. Handles Internet Identity login/logout, displays conditional links based on auth state, and includes mobile hamburger menu.
frontend/src/components/PendingRequestsL: Displays a list of pending requests (professional, vendor, ambulance, or NGO) with loading and empty states. Maps each request to a RequestDetailCard component.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile creation form for new users to select account type (hospital, professional, vendor, NGO) and enter their name. Saves user profile via mutation hook and displays success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/RequestDetailCar: Expandable card component for displaying detailed request information with approve/reject actions. Supports multiple request types (professional, vendor, ambulance, NGO) and includes contact actions (WhatsApp, email) and formatted timestamps.
frontend/src/components/StakeholderDetai: Modal dialog displaying detailed information about a stakeholder (Hospital, Vendor, or NGO) including contact details, services/specialties, and action buttons. Features scrollable content with avatar, badges, and type-specific sections.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state. Automatically recreates actor when identity changes and invalidates dependent queries to trigger refetches.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including user profiles, hospitals, healthcare professionals, vendors, NGOs, documents, and admin operations with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom design tokens for light/dark themes using OKLCH color space, including royal teal branding, dropdown styling, and mobile-responsive overflow handling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutUs.tsx: About page showcasing AI Health Zon's mission, vision, core values, services, and metrics with hero section, cards, and navigation to other pages.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard for reviewing pending stakeholder registration requests (healthcare professionals, vendors, NGOs, ambulances) with access control, summary cards, and tabbed request lists.
frontend/src/pages/AmbulanceServices.tsx: Page for ambulance service registration and search. Includes a form with PIN code auto-lookup for location, service type selection (emergency/ICU/event), and displays filtered ambulance services by city.
frontend/src/pages/Careers.tsx: Healthcare professional job application page with role selection, CV upload with progress tracking, and PIN code-based location auto-fill. Submits registration requests with pending admin approval status.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page displaying company address, phone, email, and WhatsApp contact options alongside a contact form. Includes a Chatbot component for user assistance.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: User dashboard that shows ProfileSetup if no profile exists, otherwise displays role-specific metrics cards (revenue, claims, staff, vendors for hospitals; different metrics for professionals).
frontend/src/pages/DocumentHome.tsx: Document processing landing page with hero section and file upload functionality. Allows authenticated users to upload PDFs/documents with progress tracking and converts them to structured data formats.
frontend/src/pages/Documents.tsx: Lists all user-uploaded documents with status badges (uploaded, processing, completed, failed) and navigation to individual document views. Includes authentication guard and empty state handling.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentViewer.tsx: Displays detailed view of a processed document with metadata, summary, and structured sections. Provides export functionality to JSON and TXT formats with authentication checks.
frontend/src/pages/HealthcareSupportSyst: Displays healthcare support categories including workforce, emergency services, diagnostics, pharmacy, home healthcare, mental health, vendors, and NGOs. Routes users to specific category pages or shows interest toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page with auto-rotating hero carousel showcasing RCM, technology, and healthcare network. Displays value propositions with icons for verified network, technology, and comprehensive services.
frontend/src/pages/NetworkDirectory.tsx: Searchable directory combining hospitals, vendors, and NGOs with filtering by category, location, and search term. Includes stakeholder detail view modal and active filter management with clear functionality.
frontend/src/pages/NetworkMap.tsx: Displays a visual network map of approved healthcare stakeholders across India, showing statistics (total stakeholders, cities covered) and a filterable grid of locations grouped by city with stakeholder counts.
frontend/src/pages/NgoListing.tsx: Provides NGO registration form with PIN code-based auto-fill for location and displays a filterable list of approved NGOs by location and focus area; handles submission with pending approval status.
frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx: Multi-phase onboarding walkthrough (6 phases) explaining the healthcare claim process from patient registration through claim submission, with auto-play carousel, images, and detailed control points for each phase.
frontend/src/pages/PatientJourney.tsx: Documents the 9-phase patient journey from registration to discharge, allowing hospitals to upload sample documents for each phase and document type, with preview and download capabilities.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicy.tsx: Static page displaying the platform's privacy policy covering information collection, usage, sharing, security, and user rights.
frontend/src/pages/RefundPolicy.tsx: Static page outlining refund eligibility, request process, processing times, non-refundable items, and cancellation terms for platform services.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions.tsx: Displays a comprehensive solutions page showcasing three healthcare verticals (RCM, Technology, and Marketplace) with hero images, icons, and detailed feature lists using Card components and CheckCircle icons.
frontend/src/pages/TermsConditions.tsx: Renders a static Terms & Conditions page with sections covering acceptance of terms, use of services, user responsibilities, intellectual property, liability limitations, and contact information.
frontend/src/pages/Vendors.tsx: Provides a vendor registration form with auto-fill PIN code lookup for city/state, displays existing vendors in a grid, and handles form submission with backend integration using React Query hooks.
frontend/src/utils/pinCodeLookup.ts: Fetches city and state information for Indian PIN codes using the India Post API (postalpincode.in), validates 6-digit format, and returns structured lookup results with error handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support and methods to clear parameters from URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom theme extensions including HSL-based color variables, container settings, border radius variables, accordion animations, and gradient backgrounds with additional plugins for animations, typography, and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking AI Health Zon healthcare platform development at version 51, documenting 12-page website with RCM workflow, multi-stakeholder dashboards, and registration systems. Contains known issues with chatbot functionality, gradient text display, and mobile viewport layout problems.
